ygData.subject: Re: Denon's Dissension
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe it was said that mobs have about 3 times the mana of people.. so they CAN run out, it just takes an incredibly long time. :) -Gaelaian Galaenor, bard
ygData.messageBody:
I believe it was said that mobs have about 3 times the mana of people.. so
they CAN run out, it just takes an incredibly long time. :)

-Gaelaian Galaenor, bard of the 22nd song, stuck on the backburner.
